About Me

Hello! I'm Bilal, a self-driven web developer with a passion for crafting clean, intuitive, and responsive websites. I am highly proficient in **HTML**, **CSS**, and **Tailwind CSS**. In addition to web development, I am well-versed in **Microsoft Office**, and I am always learning new tools and techniques to improve my workflow.

I have worked on several web projects, each presenting its own set of challenges and opportunities to grow. My goal is to deliver well-crafted solutions that enhance the user experience while maintaining optimal performance.
